data.name: WriteToFile
data.description: Writes content to a file at the specified path. Creates the file if it doesn't exist or overwrites if it does.
data.input_example: const result = await codebolt.fs.writeToFile('./example.txt', 'File content here');
data.input_variable_description: The relPath parameter specifies the relative file path and newContent contains the content to write.
data.raw_content: Writes content to a file at the specified path, creating the file if it doesn't exist or overwriting if it does.
